name: Flames of Freedom
description: Flames of Freedom (also known as Midwinter II: Flames of Freedom) is a first-person shooter action role-playing game with simulation elements develped by Maelstrom Games and published by MicroProse for the PC DOS, Amiga and Atari ST in 1991. It is a sequel to the 1989 game Midwinter and its working title was Wildfire. The Amiga version was re-released by Kixx XL in 1993.
